rows.label: qev092707_MSG0010
rows.name:
So, I hear you took our shiny new Skell
out for a spin and had a little "incident."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0020
rows.name: Is that about the gist of it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0030
rows.name: Boss...I can explain everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0040
rows.name: What in God's name possessed you to do that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0050
rows.name:
Not just that—you requested aid from
a third party without consulting me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0060
rows.name: Y-yes, well, I—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0070
rows.name: It was just one final test drive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0080
rows.name:
The more safety checks we do, the better.
Seems obvious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0090
rows.name: Even if those "safety checks" end up impacting our profits?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0100
rows.name: You cannot be that dense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0110
rows.name:
That Skell is already feature-complete.
It was given the all-clear, wasn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0120
rows.name:
Respectfully, sir, in this last check,
we did discover an issue with the controls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0130
rows.name:
If we'd released it like that,
there might've been all manner of accidents...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0140
rows.name: Nonsense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0150
rows.name: In that case...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0160
rows.name:
you could have simply patched
the thing after rollout.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0170
rows.name: Wha—?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0180
rows.name:
If bad news were to get out at this stage,
it would be a complete PR disaster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0190
rows.name:
Besides, this isn't something a lowly pilot
should be sticking her nose into.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0200
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0210
rows.name:
We've banked far too much on the Hraesvelg's
development for the project to fail at this stage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0220
rows.name:
Your unsolicited opinion and poor judgment
could have torpedoed all our hard work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0230
rows.name: I-I apologize, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0235
rows.name: But really, this could be disastrous—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0240
rows.name:
No, that's enough.
I've made myself clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0250
rows.name: "No faults were detected."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0255
rows.name: That'll be the report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0260
rows.name:
I won't have you two causing any more grievance.
You'll move onto the next project.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0265
rows.name: Is that clear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0270
rows.name: ...Crystal, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092707_MSG0280
rows.name: Tsk...[ST:wait ]
